name: tiation-rigger-workspace
description: Enterprise-grade workspace orchestration for the Tiation Rigger platform

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:connect-app" "npm run dev:jobs-app"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:apps && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:apps: cd components/connect-app && npm run build && cd ../jobs-app && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:apps: cd components/connect-app && npm run test && cd ../jobs-app && npm run test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:apps: cd components/connect-app && npm run lint && cd ../jobs-app && npm run lint
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:infrastructure && npm run deploy:apps
scripts.submodule:sync: git submodule sync && git submodule update --init --recursive

author: Tiation Team
